definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="MCItemBlock" id="block">block</variable><variable type="MCItemBlock" id="emitterBlock">emitterBlock</variable><variable type="MCItemBlock" id="emitterBlockOff">emitterBlockOff</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="38" y="48"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_blockstate"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:emitterBlock</field><value name="VAL"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:LightFluidBarrierEmitterOn</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_blockstate"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:emitterBlockOff</field><value name="VAL"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:LightFluidBarrierEmitter</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_blockstate"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:block</field><value name="VAL"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></value><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">OnEmitterRedstoneEventProcedure.execute(world, x, y, z, emitterBlock, emitterBlockOff);</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
